question: News editors decide what to broadcast on television and what to print in newspapers. What factors do you think influence these decisions? Do we become use to bad news? Would it be better if  more good news was reported.
text: Mass media usually serve the purpose of providing the public with happenings around the world. News editors in particular are in pole position to determine which news to be publish and televise in any media house. This essay will discuss factors that influenc their decision including news  people what to hear and paid advert. It will also discuss why broadcasting positive news will do more good that bad for the society as well as benefit of reporting good news

Trending issues in the society has always attract the attention of news editors of media houses because it is what people have interest in and what they want to hear. It is more evident nowadays among editors that they prefer to print or report news relating to politics and entertainment. In addition, media houses, as an industry, is finance with money. Therefore, it is highly important for editors to print out or publish advert, articles just to mention a few from individuals, companies or politicians who are ready to pay for the service. For instances, during my routine newspapers review, what usually dominate headlines are popular issues around my localities and around the world, and their is lot of sponsor post by editors. This trending issues and paid advertisement greatly affect what editors post to public dormain.

It is becoming a  norm nowadays that negative news spread easily around the world compare to good news. The way media paint dejected news to  enhance its popularity among people. Majority of the people are always moody to bad news. This was quite evident when Nigeria lost the first lady during former president olusegun obasanjo regime. The whole country was in shamble for a  period of time. It is therefore important to promote reporting of good new rather than otherwise.

Broadcasting and publishing of news that a beneficial to people will promote and bring out the best in them. It will promote happy society. For example, news about discovery of products that will make life easier for people will contribute to good society. Therefore promoting good news report will lead to more happy people in the society.

In conclusion, editors of news usually make decision on the type of news to publish to public dormain. This essay discussed determinant factors that influence the news they publish and also discussed reasons people find it hard to cope with bad news as well benefits of broadcasting positive news.
